faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Quick answers to common questions about our platform.
faq.answers.safety: Yes, NepFund is completely safe and secure. We use industry-standard encryption to protect all transactions and personal information. All campaigns go through a verification process before being published, and we work with trusted payment partners to ensure your donations are processed securely.
faq.answers.fees: NepFund charges a small platform fee to cover payment processing and operational costs. The exact fee structure is transparent and clearly displayed when you create a campaign or make a donation. Most of your contribution goes directly to the cause you're supporting.
faq.answers.anonymous: Yes, you can choose to donate anonymously when making a contribution. Your donation will still be counted towards the campaign goal, but your name and details will not be publicly displayed. The campaign organizer will still receive a notification of your support.
faq.questions.withdraw: How fast can I withdraw funds?
faq.answers.withdraw: Fund withdrawal typically takes 2-5 business days after your withdrawal request is approved. We verify all withdrawal requests to ensure funds are being transferred to verified bank accounts or authorized institutions. You can request withdrawals directly from your campaign dashboard once you've raised funds.
about.hero.title: Empowering Nepal, One Contribution at a Time
about.hero.subtitle: Bridging the gap between kindness and need through transparent, secure crowdfunding
about.origin.title: Our Story
about.origin.story1: NepFund was born from a simple observation: while Nepalis are incredibly generous and community-minded, there was no centralized, transparent platform to connect donors with genuine causes across the country.
about.origin.story2: We saw medical emergencies go unfunded, brilliant startup ideas die without capital, and community projects stall due to lack of resources. We realized that technology could bridge this gap‚Äîmaking it easier for people to help others while ensuring trust and transparency.
about.origin.story3: Today, NepFund is more than a platform‚Äîit's a movement dedicated to ensuring that no genuine need goes unmet due to lack of funds. We believe in the power of collective action and the spirit of giving that defines Nepal.
about.mission.title: Our Mission
about.mission.description: To democratize fundraising in Nepal by providing a secure, transparent, and easy-to-use platform for medical emergencies, social causes, and creative projects. We empower individuals and communities to make a real difference.
about.vision.title: Our Vision
about.vision.description: A Nepal where no genuine need goes unmet due to lack of funds. We envision a future where technology enables seamless giving, where every contribution counts, and where communities thrive through mutual support.
about.trust.title: The NepFund Promise
about.trust.subtitle: Trust and transparency are at the heart of everything we do. Here's how we protect you and your contributions.
about.promises.verified.title: Verified Campaigns
about.promises.verified.description: Every campaign goes through a rigorous verification process. We manually verify KYC documents and supporting materials to ensure authenticity before approval.
about.promises.secure.title: Secure Payments
about.promises.secure.description: We integrate with trusted payment partners including eSewa, Khalti, ConnectIPS, and Stripe. All transactions are encrypted and processed securely.
about.promises.transparent.title: Clear Fee Structure
about.promises.transparent.description: We maintain complete transparency about our fees. A small platform fee covers payment processing and operational costs‚Äîthe rest goes directly to the cause.
about.impact.title: Our Impact
about.impact.subtitle: Together, we're making a real difference in communities across Nepal
about.team.title: Meet the Team
about.team.subtitle: Behind NepFund is a passionate team dedicated to making giving easier and more transparent
about.team.ram.bio: 10 years of experience in financial technology. Previously worked at leading payment gateways and fintech companies in Nepal.
about.team.sita.bio: Social worker with extensive experience in community development. Passionate about making social impact accessible to everyone.
about.team.hari.bio: Tech entrepreneur and full-stack developer. Building secure, scalable platforms that serve communities across Nepal.
about.differentiators.title: Why Choose NepFund?
about.differentiators.subtitle: We're built for Nepal, by Nepalis, with local needs in mind
about.differentiators.local.title: Local Focus
about.differentiators.local.description: We understand Nepal's unique payment landscape and local context. Built specifically for Nepali donors and beneficiaries with local payment methods integrated.
about.differentiators.direct.title: Direct Payouts
about.differentiators.direct.description: Funds go directly to verified bank accounts or authorized institutions. No intermediaries‚Äîyour donation reaches where it's needed most.
about.differentiators.support.title: 24/7 Support
about.differentiators.support.descriptio: We provide round-the-clock support in both Nepali and English. Our team is always ready to help you navigate the platform and answer your questions.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store, and protect your personal information when you use our crowdfunding platform.
privacy.section1.title: 1. Information We Collect
privacy.section1.intro: We collect the following types of information:
privacy.section1.account: Account information such as your name, email, phone, and password.
privacy.section1.profile: Profile details such as your photo, biography, and location (if you choose to provide them).
privacy.section1.campaign: Campaign data including titles, descriptions, images, and funding goals you create.
privacy.section1.donation: Donation information such as amounts, timestamps, and campaigns you support.
privacy.section1.technical: Technical data including IP address, device information, and log data.
privacy.section2.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
privacy.section2.operate: Provide, operate, and improve our platform and services.
privacy.section2.process: Process donations and manage campaigns securely.
privacy.section2.verify: Verify your identity and help keep the platform safe.
privacy.section2.communicate: Communicate with you about your account, campaigns, and updates.
privacy.section2.personalize: Personalize your experience, such as showing relevant campaigns.
privacy.section3.title: 3. Sharing of Information
privacy.section3.intro: We do not sell your personal information. We may share limited information with:
privacy.section3.payment: Payment processors to complete secure transactions.
privacy.section3.providers: Service providers who help us operate the platform (e.g., hosting, analytics).
privacy.section3.authorities: Authorities, when required by law or to protect our users and platform.
privacy.section4.title: 4. Data Retention & Security
privacy.section4.content: We retain your information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide our services and comply with legal obligations. We use reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse.
privacy.section5.title: 5. Your Rights & Choices
privacy.section5.intro: You may have the right to:
privacy.section5.access: Access, update, or delete certain personal information in your account.
privacy.section5.preferences: Change your communication preferences or unsubscribe from marketing emails.
privacy.section5.clarification: Request clarification about how your data is processed.
privacy.section6.title: 6. Contact Us
privacy.section6.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please contact us at
terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: These Terms of Service govern your access to and use of our crowdfunding platform. By creating an account, starting a campaign, or making a donation, you agree to be bound by these terms.
terms.section1.title: 1. Use of the Platform
terms.section1.intro: You agree to use the platform only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You are responsible for all activity that occurs under your account.
terms.section1.accurate: You must provide accurate and complete information when registering.
terms.section1.lawful: You will not use the platform to commit fraud, money laundering, or other illegal acts.
terms.section1.respect: You will respect other users and refrain from harassment, hate speech, or abuse.
terms.section2.title: 2. Campaign Owners
terms.section2.intro: If you create or manage a campaign, you are solely responsible for the content, accuracy, and fulfillment of promises made in your campaign.
terms.section2.comply: Campaigns must comply with applicable laws and our community guidelines.
terms.section2.funds: You must use funds only for the purposes stated in your campaign.
terms.section2.updates: You are responsible for providing updates to donors and fulfilling any rewards you offer.
terms.section3.title: 3. Donors
terms.section3.intro: When you donate to a campaign, you understand that you are supporting a project or cause and that outcomes cannot be guaranteed.
terms.section3.refund: Donations are generally non-refundable unless required by law or our policies.
terms.section3.payment: You are responsible for ensuring your payment information is accurate and authorized.
terms.section3.rewards: Any rewards offered are the responsibility of the campaign owner, not the platform.
terms.section4.title: 4. Fees & Payments
terms.section4.content: We may charge service or processing fees on donations or withdrawals. Any applicable fees will be disclosed during the payment or payout process.
terms.section5.title: 5. Content & Intellectual Property
terms.section5.content: You retain ownership of content you submit, but grant us a limited, non-exclusive license to use, display, and share it for the purpose of operating and promoting the platform.
terms.section6.title: 6. Termination
terms.section6.content: We may suspend or terminate your access to the platform at any time if we believe you have violated these Terms or engaged in harmful or unlawful behavior.
terms.section7.title: 7. Disclaimer & Limitation of Liability
terms.section7.content: The platform is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. To the fullest extent permitted by law, we are not liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising from your use of the platform.

terms.section8.content: We may update these Terms from time to time. When we do, we will update the "Last updated" date above. Your continued use of the platform after changes take effect means you accept the revised Terms.

cookie.title: Cookie Policy
cookie.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how our website uses cookies and similar technologies to recognize you, understand how you use the platform, and improve your experience.
cookie.section1.title: 1. What Are Cookies?
cookie.section1.content: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites remember your actions and preferences (such as login, language, and display settings) over a period of time.
cookie.section2.title: 2. Types of Cookies We Use
cookie.section2.necessary: Strictly necessary cookies ‚Äì required for the platform to function, such as keeping you logged in and securing your session.
cookie.section2.preference: Preference cookies ‚Äì remember your choices, such as language, so we can provide a more personalized experience.
cookie.section2.analytics: Analytics cookies ‚Äì help us understand how visitors use the platform so we can improve features and performance.
cookie.section2.marketing: Marketing or tracking cookies ‚Äì may be used to deliver relevant content or measure the effectiveness of campaigns, where applicable.
cookie.section3.title: 3. What Data Do Cookies Collect?
cookie.section3.content: Depending on the type of cookie, we may collect information such as your IP address, browser type, device information, pages visited, time spent on pages, and actions taken on the platform. We do not use cookies to directly identify you by name unless combined with account information you provide.
cookie.section4.title: 4. Third-Party Cookies
cookie.section4.content: Some cookies may be placed by third-party services integrated into our platform (for example, analytics or payment providers). These third parties have their own privacy and cookie policies, which we encourage you to review.
cookie.section5.title: 5. Managing Cookies
cookie.section5.intro: You can control and manage cookies in several ways:
cookie.section5.browser: Adjust your browser settings to block or delete cookies.
cookie.section5.site: Use in-site cookie settings if provided to manage consent preferences.
cookie.section5.optout: Opt out of certain third-party analytics or marketing tools where available.
cookie.section5.note: Please note that disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality and performance of the platform.
cookie.section6.title: 6. Changes to This Cookie Policy
cookie.section6.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in technology, law, or our services. When we do, we will update the "Last updated" date above.
cookie.section7.title: 7. Contact
cookie.section7.content: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us at
